code: public IndicesExistsRequestBuilder setIndices(String... indices) {     request.indices(indices).     return this. }

comment: /**  * Controls whether wildcard expressions will be expanded to existing open indices  */
code: /**  * Controls whether wildcard expressions will be expanded to existing open indices  */ public IndicesExistsRequestBuilder setExpandWildcardsOpen(boolean expandWildcardsOpen) {     request.expandWilcardsOpen(expandWildcardsOpen).     return this. }

comment: /**  * Controls whether wildcard expressions will be expanded to existing closed indices  */
code: /**  * Controls whether wildcard expressions will be expanded to existing closed indices  */ public IndicesExistsRequestBuilder setExpandWildcardsClosed(boolean expandWildcardsClosed) {     request.expandWilcardsClosed(expandWildcardsClosed).     return this. }
